site_title: Prism Phone Stand by Wilson Lee

block_list.title: Video Tutorial
block_list.body: I designed this Origami Prism Phone Stand to have a phone stand with a smaller footprint when compared to what is available. This phone stand is also folded from a square sheet. A 15cm or 6in square sheet will be big enough for an IPhone 8 Max. I hope you find it useful. Enjoy! Please find the diagram here : https://heapart.github.io/site/pages/diagrams/prismphonestand.html Thanks For Watching! Wilson Lee @Heap Art
